column2: "you must know that the tides are the rise and fall of the waters of the ocean. It will be high tide an hour from now; then the water will cover all these rocks you see around us. After that
column3: the water will sink and go back till we can see the rocks again
column4: and walk a long way on the sand; then it will be low tide. But we must not stay here talking: the water will soon be too deep for us."So Rodney took Rose in his arms
column5: and Julia placed her left hand on his right shoulder; and in this way they went through the water to the dry part of the beach."We must look out for this sly tide the next time
column6: said little Rose as she ran to tell papa of their adventure.
